channel.title: Comments on: Rick Segal and Shel Israel to visit Ireland

item.title: By: Val Cassidy
item.dc:creator: Val Cassidy
item.description:
It's a little late, but I 'd like to put my name down
Val Cassidy www.xoetrope.com
item.content:encoded:
It’s a little late, but I ‘d like to put my name down

Val Cassidy
http://www.xoetrope.com/

item.title: By: Brian O'Doherty
item.dc:creator: Brian O'Doherty
item.description:
I hope to be there
Brian O'Doherty GroupFactor.com
item.content:encoded:
I hope to be there

Brian O’Doherty
GroupFactor.com

item.title: By: Fergal Breen
item.dc:creator: Fergal Breen
item.description:
Afraid a work issue has cropped up and I'm not going to able to attend after all :(
If possible I'll call by later but can't be certain at this time.
Good luck. Talk to you later.
item.content:encoded:
Afraid a work issue has cropped up and I’m not going to able to attend after all

If possible I’ll call by later but can’t be certain at this time.

Good luck. Talk to you later.

item.title: By: Fergal Breen
item.dc:creator: Fergal Breen
item.description: Fergal Breen from IrishDev.com will be attending tonight.
item.content:encoded: Fergal Breen from IrishDev.com will be attending tonight.

item.title: By: Clare Dillon
item.dc:creator: Clare Dillon
item.description:
I'll be along tonight too.
See you there!
item.content:encoded:
I’ll be along tonight too.

See you there!

item.title: By: Ciaran Bradley
item.dc:creator: Ciaran Bradley
item.description: Count me in. I'm another mobile geek, so Peter won't be the only one.
item.content:encoded: Count me in. I’m another mobile geek, so Peter won’t be the only one.

item.title: By: Gavin Killen
item.dc:creator: Gavin Killen
item.description: Looking forward to it. See you there.
item.content:encoded: Looking forward to it. See you there.

item.title: By: Mathieu Gorge
item.dc:creator: Mathieu Gorge
item.description:
Count me in too. Looking forward to seeing you then.
Regards, Mathieu
item.content:encoded:
Count me in too. Looking forward to seeing you then.

Regards, Mathieu
